Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
pizza_classes.Pizza

DeluxePizza, HawaiianPizza, PepperoniPizza
public abstract class Pizza
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a Pizza.
Author:
Kevin Cubillos, Ethan Chang
